amendment.description: Amendment requires a General Accounting Office study to evaluate and determine the reasons for the decline in the number of medical school graduates entering residency programs lasting more than 5 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-399 to require a study by GAO to evaluate and determine reasons for the decline in the number of medical school graduates entering residency programs lasting more than 5 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boustany amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Boustany.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boustany amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
